title: Presidential Nomination Sent to the Senate | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
July 30, 2013

 



Presidential Nomination Sent to the Senate




NOMINATION SENT TO THE SENATE:
Nicholas Christopher Geale, of Virginia, to be a Member of the National Mediation Board for a term expiring July 1, 2016.Â  (Reappointment)
